title: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

title: The present moment is a precious gift. Stop, look, and appreciate it.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response. In our response lies our growth and our freedom.
author: Viktor Frankl

title: Associate with people who are likely to improve you.
author: Seneca

title: Where there is anger, there is always pain underneath.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: Men are disturbed not by things, but by the views which they take of them.
author: Epictetus

title: Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with it.
author: Dorothy Thomas

title: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca

title: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
author: Dalai Lama

title: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
author: William James

title: You find peace not by rearranging the circumstances of your life, but by realizing who you are at the deepest level.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: Some things are up to us and some things are not up to us.
author: Epictetus

title: Holding on to anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
author: Buddhist Proverb

title: Donâ€™t wait to be successful at some future point. Have a successful relationship with the present moment and be fully present in whatever you are doing.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
author: Marcus Aurelius

title: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you.
author: Brian Tracy

title: Wherever you are, be there totally. If you find your here and now intolerable and it makes you unhappy, you have three options: remove yourself from the situation, change it, or accept it totally.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, courage to change the things I can, and wisdom to know the difference.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

title: All negativity is caused by an accumulation of psychological time and denial of the present.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: Pleasure is always derived from something outside you, whereas joy arises from within.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: Do not be concerned with the fruit of your action - just give attention to the action itself. The fruit will come of its accord.
author: Ekhart Tolle

title: When people show you who they are, believe them the first time.
author: Maya Angelou
